BackstoryDef.title: bone gnawer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the harsh wastes as part of the Zhul tribe, learning to survive by gnawing marrow from enemy bones and crafting tools from the remains of the devoured. [PAWN_pronoun] spent childhood hours listening to the screams trapped in ritual daggers.

BackstoryDef.title: spirit whisperer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised among the bone altars of the Zhul, learning to commune with the spirits of devoured enemies. [PAWN_pronoun] studied ancient cannibal rituals and the mystical properties of properly cured human flesh from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: moustache keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an apprentice to the tribal moustache masters, learning the sacred art of facial hair cultivation and the rituals that bind warrior spirits to their elaborate whiskers. [PAWN_pronoun] memorized countless grooming ceremonies.

BackstoryDef.title: tribal warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a feared warrior of the Zhul tribe, leading raids against enemy settlements and perfecting the art of terror through elaborate moustache displays. [PAWN_pronoun] collected the screams of dying foes in ritual bone containers.

BackstoryDef.title: bone shaman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the sacred position of bone shaman within the Zhul tribe, interpreting the will of devoured spirits and maintaining the ancient knowledge of cannibalistic rituals. [PAWN_pronoun] could read omens in the patterns of cracked skulls.

BackstoryDef.title: flesh crafter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the tribe's master flesh crafter, transforming the bodies of enemies into useful tools, clothing, and ritual implements. [PAWN_pronoun] knew hundreds of recipes for preparing different types of humanlike meat for both sustenance and ceremony.
